description: Returns a list of Recommendation objects that contain recommendations for a profiling group for a given time period. A list of Anomaly objects that contains details about anomalies detected in the profiling group for the same time period is also returned.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The start time of the profile to get analysis data about. You must specify startTime and endTime. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language used to provide analysis. Specify using a string that is one of the following BCP 47 language codes. de-DE - German, Germany en-GB - English, United Kingdom en-US - English, United States es-ES - Spanish, Spain fr-FR - French, France it-IT - Italian, Italy ja-JP - Japanese, Japan ko-KR - Korean, Republic of Korea pt-BR - Portugese, Brazil zh-CN - Chinese, China zh-TW - Chinese, Taiwan.

parameters.name: profilingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the profiling group to get analysis data about.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The end time of the profile to get analysis data about. You must specify startTime and endTime. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: anomalies
nested_items.description: The list of anomalies that the analysis has found for this profile.

nested_items.name: instances
nested_items.description: A list of the instances of the detected anomalies during the requested period.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the period during which the metric is flagged as anomalous. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of an instance of an anomaly in a metric.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the period during which the metric is flagged as anomalous. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: userFeedback
nested_items.description: Feedback type on a specific instance of anomaly submitted by the user.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Optional Positive or Negative feedback submitted by the user about whether the recommendation is useful or not.

nested_items.name: frameName
nested_items.description: The name of the method that appears as a frame in any stack in a profile.

nested_items.name: threadStates
nested_items.description: The list of application runtime thread states that is used to calculate the metric value for the frame.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: A type that specifies how a metric for a frame is analyzed. The supported value AggregatedRelativeTotalTime is an aggregation of the metric value for one frame that is calculated across the occurences of all frames in a profile.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for which metric was flagged as anomalous.

nested_items.name: profileEndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the profile the analysis data is about. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: profileStartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the profile the analysis data is about. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: profilingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the profiling group the analysis data is about.

nested_items.name: recommendations
nested_items.description: The list of recommendations that the analysis found for this profile.

nested_items.name: allMatchesCount
nested_items.description: How many different places in the profile graph triggered a match.

nested_items.name: allMatchesSum
nested_items.description: How much of the total sample count is potentially affected.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: End time of the profile that was used by this analysis. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: countersToAggregate
nested_items.description: A list of the different counters used to determine if there is a match.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the recommendation. This explains a potential inefficiency in a profiled application.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of this pattern.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name for this pattern.

nested_items.name: resolutionSteps
nested_items.description: A string that contains the steps recommended to address the potential inefficiency.

nested_items.name: targetFrames
nested_items.description: A list of frame names that were searched during the analysis that generated a recommendation.
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: thresholdPercent
nested_items.description: The percentage of time an application spends in one method that triggers a recommendation. The percentage of time is the same as the percentage of the total gathered sample counts during analysis.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the profile that was used by this analysis. This is specified using the ISO 8601 format. For example, 2020-06-01T13:15:02.001Z represents 1 millisecond past June 1, 2020 1:15:02 PM UTC.

nested_items.name: topMatches
nested_items.description: List of the matches with most impact.

nested_items.name: frameAddress
nested_items.description: The location in the profiling graph that contains a recommendation found during analysis.

nested_items.name: targetFramesIndex
nested_items.description: The target frame that triggered a match.

nested_items.name: thresholdBreachValue
nested_items.description: The value in the profile data that exceeded the recommendation threshold.
